titles: Iacke Drums entertainment: or The comedie of Pasquill and Katherine As it hath bene sundry times plaide by the Children of Powles.
author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.
publisher: Printed [By Thomas Creede] for Richard Oliue, dwelling in Long Lane,
notes: Running title reads: A pleasant comedie of Pasquill and Katherine.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
